variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: Randomly-generated 6-digit ID code preceded by CHOP ID code (95)
variable.comment: Non-enumerated value domain. Deidentified ID where the first two digits denote the origination site of the samples; site key: 16=Marshfield Clinic; 27=Vanderbilt University; 38=Group Health Cooperative; 49=Mayo Clinic; 52=Northwestern University; 63=Geisinger; 74=Mt. Sinai; 95=CHOP 6-digit random integer appended to the 2-digit site identifier.

variable.name: ORIGIN_ID
variable.description: ID of eMERGE Consortium Site
variable.comment: 16=Marshfield Clinic; 27=Vanderbilt University; 38=GHC/Seattle; 49=Mayo Clinic; 52=Northwestern University; 63=Geisinger; 74=Mt. Sinai; 95=CHOP

variable.name: Year_of_Birth
variable.description: Year of birth

variable.name: Sex_Med
variable.description: Gender of participant as identified by medical records
variable.comment: F=Female; M=Male

variable.name: Sex_Survey
variable.description: Gender of participant as identified by survey of patient/patient's parent
variable.comment: F=Female; M=Male

variable.name: Race_Med
variable.description: Ethnicity of participant as identified by medical records
variable.comment: AA=Black or African American; AI=American Indian or Alaska Native; AS=Asian; EA=European American; HI=Hispanic/Latino; PI=Native Hawaiian/Pacific islander; OT=Other; NA=Not Available/Missing Dataset enriched for European and African American samples.

variable.name: Race_Survey
variable.description: Ethnicity of participant as identified by patient/patient's parent
variable.comment: AA=Black or African American; AI=American Indian or Alaska Native; AS=Asian; EA=European American; HI=Hispanic/Latino; PI=Native Hawaiian/Pacific islander; OT=Other; NA=Not Available/Missing Dataset enriched for European and African American samples.
variable.value: Black or African American; American Indian or Alaska Native
Black or African American; European American
Black or African American; Hispanic/Latino; European American
Black or African American; Hispanic/Latino; Other

European American; Native Hawaiian/Pacific Islander; American Indian or Alaska Native; Other
Hispanic/Latino; Black or African American; European American
Hispanic/Latino; Other; American Indian or Alaska Native

variable.name: Affection_Status
variable.description: Indicates whether participant is a case or control
variable.comment: 1=Control; 2=Case

variable.name: Chip_Type
variable.description: Array on which participants were genotyped
variable.comment: QUAD=Illumina Human610-Quadv1 V1=Illumina HumanHap550v1 V2=Illumina HumanHap550v2 V3=Illumina HumanHap550v3

variable.name: Primary_Diagnoses
variable.description: Primary diagnosis as defined by ICD9 code(s)
variable.comment: ICD9 codes can be reviewed at: icd9 v77.91=(V77.91) Screening for lipoid disorders. Screening cholesterol level, screening for hypercholesterolemia, screening for hyperlipidemia.
variable.value: Screening for lipoid disorders. Screening cholesterol level, screening for hypercholesterolemia, screening for hyperlipidemia

variable.name: Secondary_Diagnoses
variable.description: Secondary diagnoses as defined by ICD9 code(s)
variable.comment: The list of ICD9 codes/definitions is too large to include in the data dictionary and can be reviewed at: icd9

variable.name: Lipid_procedure_codes
variable.description: Codes for procedures/tests performed
variable.comment: 1002002=Consult to healthy weight; 9004=weight managing counseling; 9007=consult to endocrinology; 9020=Consult to nutrition; 9227=Consult to weight management
variable.value: Consult to healthy weight; weight managing counseling; consult to endocrinology; Consult to nutrition

variable.name: LDL_Values
variable.description: Low-density lipoprotein (LDL) values for all procedures/tests.
variable.comment: Parentheses contain age in days and time of day. Age in days is calculated from birth year only. All ages are calculated assuming the individual was born on January 1st of their birth year.

variable.name: Recent_LDL
variable.description: Most recent LDL visit.
variable.comment: Parentheses contain age in days and time of day. Age in days is calculated from birth year only. All ages are calculated assuming the individual was born on January 1st of their birth year.

variable.name: Recent_LDL_value
variable.description: Most recent low-density lipoprotein (LDL) value

variable.name: Recent_LDL_age_days
variable.description: Most recent low-density lipoprotein (LDL) value.
variable.comment: Parentheses contain age in days and time of day. Age in days is calculated from birth year only, based on the calculation that the individual was born on January 1st of their birth year.

variable.name: Recent_Time_of_Day
variable.description: Time of day of most recent visit in which LDL was recorded

variable.name: VLDL_Values
variable.description: Very low-density lipoprotein (VLDL) values for all procedures/tests performed
variable.comment: Parentheses contain age in days and time of day. Age in days is calculated from birth year only. All ages are calculated assuming the individual was born on January 1st of their birth year.

variable.name: HDL_values
variable.description: Human low-density lipoprotein (HLDL) values for all procedures/tests performed
variable.comment: Parentheses contain age in days and time of day. Age in days is calculated from birth year only. All ages are calculated assuming the individual was born on January 1st of their birth year.

variable.name: Trig_Values
variable.description: Triglycerides values for all procedures/tests performed
variable.comment: Parentheses contain age in days and time of day. Age in days is calculated from birth year only. All ages are calculated assuming the individual was born on January 1st of their birth year.

variable.name: LDL_MAX
variable.description: Maximum LDL values based on all visits

variable.name: LDL_Min
variable.description: Minimum LDL values based on all visits

variable.name: Visit_Count
variable.description: Number of visits in which LDL was recorded

variable.name: LDL_Mean
variable.description: Mean LDL values based on all visits

variable.name: LDL_Median
variable.description: Median LDL values based on all visits

variable.name: Percentile
variable.description: LDL percentile score
variable.comment: Calculation based on median LDL score.

variable.name: Top 17%
variable.description: Indicates whether individual's median LDL value was in the top 17% of all patients in CHOP database
variable.comment: 1 = Yes; 2 = No

variable.name: Bottom 17%
variable.description: Indicates whether individual's median LDL value was in the bottom 17% of all patients in CHOP database
variable.comment: 1 = Yes; 2 = No

variable.name: 10th_Perc_Thresh
variable.description: Age equivalent LDL threshold for 10th percentile based on "Growth Curves for Cardio-Metabolic Risk Factors in Children and Adolescents" (Cook et al., 2009. PMID: 19732566). Individuals over 18 years of age were aligned with the threshold value for 18-year-olds.

variable.name: 90th_Perc_Thresh
variable.description: Age equivalent LDL threshold for 90th percentile based on "Growth Curves for Cardio-Metabolic Risk Factors in Children and Adolescents" (Cook et al., 2009. PMID: 19732566). Individuals over 18 years of age were aligned with the threshold value for 18-year-olds.

variable.name: 10th_Perc
variable.description: Indicates whether individual's median LDL value was at the 10th percentile based on "Growth Curves for Cardio-Metabolic Risk Factors in Children and Adolescents" (Cook et al., 2009. PMID: 19732566)
variable.comment: 1 = Yes; 2 = No

variable.name: 90th_Perc
variable.description: Indicates whether individual's median LDL value was at the 90th percentile based on "Growth Curves for Cardio-Metabolic Risk Factors in Children and Adolescents" (Cook et al., 2009. PMID: 19732566)
variable.comment: 1 = Yes; 2 = No
